long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover news provides a fully customisable new tab experience that enhances    your browsing efficiency and productivity. With features like news from around the world, note management with advanced filtering, image carousel, local news, and theme customisation,  this extension is designed to streamline your daily tasks and make your browser more personalised and useful.

Why Users Should Install This Extension?

* Security and Privacy: Your data is securely stored and managed using Chrome’s storage, ensuring that your preferences and notes remain private and are only accessible to you.

* Convenience: Easily manage your news, quick links, and notes all in one place.   The extension also includes media controls, allowing you to pause, play, or skip music directly from your new tab. Additionally, you can customize your new tab background with preset images or upload your own.

* Productivity: The notes feature allows you to categorize and filter your notes, ensuring that you stay organized.   The geolocation functionality can be used to quickly access location-specific content, while the customizable   themes let you adjust the appearance of your new tab to suit your work environment.

*Customisable News Feed:
Stay updated with news tailored to your interests. The extension fetches localized news based on your geolocation and saves keywords from article titles, allowing you to filter and manage what matters most to you. Never miss out on important news again with our keyword-based notification system.

*Advanced Keyword Management:
Save, delete, and manage keywords to keep your news feed relevant. Enjoy the convenience of a dropdown filter to quickly access articles related to your keywords, with a notification system ensuring you’re aware of any new content.

*Persistent Notes & Categorisation:
Keep track of your thoughts and tasks with our integrated notes feature. Save up to 12 notes, categorise them, and easily update or delete as needed. Your notes are stored securely, with timestamps for creation, updates, and copies.

*Image Carousel & Background Customisation:
Personalise your new tab page with a dynamic image carousel. Choose from a range of backgrounds, adjust the display interval, and switch between light and dark themes with ease. Your preferences are saved, so your experience is always tailored to your liking.

Summary: This extension is perfect for users looking to enhance their Chrome browsing experience  with added functionality, privacy, and customisation options. Whether you’re a productivity   enthusiast or just want more control over your new tab page, discover news has you covered.
